Tax Relief Services

Tax Relief Call Center

The TeleDirect solution for your tax relief contact center starts with our proven approach to deliver high quality leads. Our lead generation and lead qualification process will make sure that your internal sales teams are able to focus on speaking with eligible prospects who qualify to receive support. Our business consultants will work with you to optimize your lead generation efforts. We will identify existing opportunities for increased conversion, develop a call flow to quickly capture interest and get the qualified prospect connected to your tax experts. Our proven business model allows us to effortlessly implement a workable, affordable, customizable solution for your tax debt relief call center. It’s that simple. Even if current tax laws are anything but simple!

We break down the typical tax relief call into three segments: the anatomy of the call, analysis of the customer’s request and answers to ensure client satisfaction. From your perspective, there’s nothing “typical” about tax relief help; every client concern is different. That’s why we’ll work with you on an individual basis and support your tax relief contact center with ongoing support.

Here is an outline of this process:

  • Anatomy. The anatomy of a client call into a tax relief firm is based on a simple premise: why are your customers calling in the first place? That why is typically emotionally charged with the need for help. TeleDirect makes customer needs the centerpiece of our tax debt relief call center solution. From streamlined, accessible answers to frequently asked questions to more complex customer inquiry and intake situations, the initial call is the most critical step for your firm – and it’s also where our expertise, technology, scripting and training allow us to design and deliver on a flexible solution to your call center challenges.
  • Analysis. Once your clients have requested information – from our high touch live support channel – TeleDirect analyzes the unique yet similar aspects with each call. While no two client calls are the same, subtle similarities exist. TeleDirect’s formidable tax relief contact center solutions are enhanced with a never-ending evaluation of your firm’s call center activity. In an information-rich environment like a tax relief call center, this approach helps with quality control measures, lead conversion and ultimately ensures customer satisfaction. Our analysis will help drive new qualified prospects into your pipeline and grow topline revenue.
  • Answers. We know that every question presents an opportunity to win a customer’s trust.  How your tax relief call services produce instant, actionable answers in support of your internal teams is integral to delivering a world class customer experience from tax audit defense – about individual 1040 returns, tax debt relief, corporate tax credits and more – is paramount to your bottom line. With TeleDirect’s BPO structure in place, your tax debt relief call center can handle more calls in less time. Your clients have questions – and with TeleDirect in your corner, you’ll have all the ability to provide more answers, leverage our staff so your team can focus on delivering the answers your clients demand. Whether it is inbound or outbound support that you need, we have you covered with 24/7/365 customer support and an always-accessible client information portal.

Find Out More about Our Tax Debt Relief Call Center Solutions

Optimize your tax relief call center capability today. TeleDirect’s in-house team of outsourcing providers and IT professionals will establish a practical solution for any existing issues, whether they’re minor annoyances or major hurdles.

With our customized tax relief contact center program in place, you can concentrate on what you do best. Focus on the issues that matter to your bottom line, and let TeleDirect coordinate your call center initiatives. You’ll save money in the long run, grow your customer base and enjoy a decided advantage over the competition.

TeleDirect’s cost-effective, innovative call center solutions already work in other financial sectors – see how our tax relief call services can help today. We’re also an established and reliable call center BPO provider for the healthcare industry, insurance companies and many other business sectors.

To learn more about our comprehensive suite of tax relief call center services, please call us directly at (800) 776-1081. Or, visit our contact page and fill out our client care form. We’ll get back in touch with you and discuss options to improve and perfect your tax debt relief call center. Thanks for considering TeleDirect as your preferred call center solution – we look forward to working with you!
